title: Question about low priority queue
body: I had to leave in the middle of agame and I was given a 5 match low priority queue penalty. So I start a game and Im given a 20 minute wait. I browse Facebook for a while and look to see how much time is left on the timer and there is 5 minutes left...then I check back a few minutes later and its back up to 18 minutes. It keeps getting low and then going back up...whats going on? Ive been waiting an hour overall to play one game.

replies.body: Did you happen to have a screenshot or are able to grab one if that happens again? I don't have any way to check on my end, but if I can clearly see where that timer resets I might be able to work some magic.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=ire6dATO,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-10T21:55:08.786+0000)
>
> Did you happen to have a screenshot or are able to grab one if that happens again? I don't have any way to check on my end, but if I can clearly see where that timer resets I might be able to work some magic.

I dont..but Im done with the 5 low priority queue matches. I closed the client and re-opened it and that stopped
Sweetness! Sounds like refreshing your client's connection did the trick!
